Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is that it uses '==' operator to compare strings which compares the reference not the actual content. It should use '.equals()' method to compare the content of the strings. Generated Test cases 1-7 (7/13) should pass the buggy code, as they have strings of length less than or equal to 2 or the first two characters do not match the last two. Test cases 8-13 (6/13) should fail the buggy code, as they have strings where the first two characters match the last two.
